revised_title: A Case Study of a Woman Suckling her Grandchildren
tldr: A letter from Thomas Stack, M.D., describes the case of a 68-year-old woman who suckles her grandchildren. Despite her age and the absence of childbirth for over 20 years, the woman produces milk and nurses her two granddaughters, who are reported to be healthy and thriving. The author discusses the unusual nature of this phenomenon and the woman's belief in it being a miracle.
